title: 7.2.1 Create scanner base classes and models
body:
## Parent Issue
#30 - 7.2 Security Scanner Engine

## Objective
Create base classes for scanner framework and data models.

## Classes
- BaseScannerRule: Individual security check
- BaseScanner: Service scanner base class
- Finding: Finding data model
- ScanJob: Scan job tracking model

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/scanners/base.py`
- `src/cloud_optimizer/models/scan_job.py`
- `src/cloud_optimizer/models/finding.py`
- `alembic/versions/xxx_create_scan_tables.py`

## Estimated Time: 2.5 hours
